Title: Hécate
Writer: Paul Morand (novel), Pascal Jardin (adaptation), Daniel Schmid (adaptation), Pascal Jardin (dialogue)
Actors: Bernard Giraudeau, Lauren Hutton, Jean Bouise, Jean-Pierre Kalfon
Plot: North Africa in the 1930s. Julien, a young, bored diplomat meets Clothilde, whose husband is on a mission in Siberia. He becomes infatuated with her, and soon ends up spending all his time with her, longing to know everything about her.
